frontmatter.title: React Conference 2021 - State of their Art
frontmatter.subtitle: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others. - Jonathan Swift
frontmatter.excerpt: Recap of the 6th React Conf, hosted online - React 18, concurrency, Suspense
frontmatter.author: Mark Roxberry

markdownRemark.html:
React Conference 2021 - State of their Art

React Conf Website

Feature Recap

Concurrent Features

  • implement Concurrent renderer in React 18 with no (known) breaking changes

Suspense and Server Components

  • granular component streaming from the server

Developer Notes

  • new React DevTools team
  • new Timeline Profiler for debugging

React 18 RC

Available for feedback:

npm install react@rc react-dom@rc

Change entry to use createRoot

// before
const container = document.getElementById('root');
ReactDOM.render(<App />, container);

// after
const container = document.getElementById('root');
const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(container);
root.render(<App/>);
